snippet.title: NAIRI: Rising Tide (Announcement Trailer)
snippet.description:
NAIRI: Rising Tide is OUT NOW on Nintendo Switch and PC!

⚙️Steam⚙️
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1225200/NAIRI_Rising_Tide/

🍄Nintendo Switch🍄
https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/nairi-rising-tide-switch/

The story continues in the highly anticipated second chapter of NAIRI! 
In this graphic adventure, Nairi pushes onward on her perilous quest to save her family, leaving the Tower of Shirin's grimy slums behind.


🐻Social Links🐻
Website  https://homebearstudio.com
X https://twitter.com/HomeBearStudio
Discord https://discord.com/invite/nairi
Instagram https://www.instagram.com/homebearstudioofficial/
TikTok https://www.tiktok.com/@homebearstudio


#towerofshirin #risingtide  #indiegame #visualnovel #puzzlegame
#indiegameart #nintendoswitch #cutegame #解谜 #解谜游戏 #冒险 #游戏 
#ライジングタイド #ナイリ #インディーゲーム #アドベンチャーゲーム #シリンの塔 
#タワーオブシリン
